ygData.msgSnippet: OK, I ll take Megaton over but I ll have to change a few of your posts, #1 Megaton stumbled into a temporal rift in a cave, not travelled by time machine. #2

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

OK, I'll take Megaton over but I'll have to change a few of your posts,

#1 Megaton stumbled into a temporal rift in a cave, not travelled by time
machine.
#2 He's not out for revenge or unnecessary destruction, all he wants is a
little piece. A piece of Earth, a piece of Cybertron, a piece of nebulos,
ect.
#3 He's to reserved to go out hunting for a bot that had just beaten the tar
out of him, he'd find someone to do it for him.
#4 Megatons ideal ally is someone as strong or stronger than he is, that way
he knows he'll win a battle, if his side wins he wins, if his side loses the
stronger bots destroyed and a potential threat dies with him.
and last but not least
#5 Megaton ditched Veratis to claim his rightfull place as leader of the
Predacons and ruler of the universe so he doesn't have any immediate use of
a CR chamber unless he flies all the way back to the Black Fortress.

From: <dewboy30816@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 18, 2001 4:14 AM
Subject: Re: angry


> Megaton furiously stomped out of the C.R. chamber. Time for revenge,
